title: Paul Renner - Help!
content: Hey guys! I have this project for my typography class that I need help with. We were assigned to design a poster for an art gallery exhibition on a typographer and I need help coming up with a concept and also a tag line/slogan. The typographer that I have is [Paul Renner](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Renner), the guy who designed [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Futura). Any ideas would be great and would be a big help!
author: c2dawut

comments.content:
Welcome to Typophile, Chester.

It might be better if you bring <cite>your</cite> ideas to the table first. Take it from there.

This might help kick start the research:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/18227](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/typophile.com/node/18227 "http://typophile.com/node/18227")  
 [http://typophile.com/wiki/Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Futura "http://typophile.com/wiki/Futura")  
 [http://typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Renner](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Renner "http://typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Renner")

It's worth using the search facility. There's a wealth of information here.

Well one of my ideas that I have is sort of focus on the way Futura is used a lot on identities of fashion lines like Louis Vuitton, Calvin Klein and D&G. Also I noticed that It's also used on perfumes by Britney Spears and J.Lo and as well as in Ikea catalogs and many other magazine ads. I need a slogan/tag line that would tie those in together.

Have a look:  
 [http://www.100besteschriften.de/5\_Futura.html#a5](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/www.100besteschriften.de/5_Futura.html#a5 "http://www.100besteschriften.de/5\_Futura.html#a5")  
(the text is German, but the images speak a universal language)

_...used on perfumes by Britney Spears and J.Lo..._

Surely not the reason why Hrant Papazian once called it **Fartura** on this site?

Don't get me wrong – I really _like_ Futura, but Chester, does that give you any ideas for your slogan? Apparently Hitler liked the look of it too..

[Buy this book ASAP.](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627031420/http:/www.amazon.com/Paul-Renner-Typography-Christopher-Burke/dp/1568981589/sr=8-1/qid=1172758225/ref=pd_bbs_sr_1/104-1774576-9253519?ie=UTF8&s=books) It's an excellent biography about Paul Renner, both exhaustively researched and well-written. And it's short enough to breeze through over a weekend if you need it for a school project.
Thanks people! Keep them ideas coming!
